name: Imperception
description:
MonoGame Game Jam of 2018. Theme: Footstep.

What was supposed to be a short game for a MonoGame game jam had turned out to be an idea for a potential future project. This demo made for the game jam was not finished on time,  sadly. But the proof of concept is there at least~

Controls
Enter: Bypass pre-game screens.
Up: Enter Doors.
E: Action Key.

Goals
• Add more rooms
• Add more gameplay elements (Other than simply roaming and avoiding death)
• Improve AI
• Add story elements
• Add more sound effects for everything

Coder: Lexyvil
Art: Garuu, Nene
